name: Diamond Solitaire Ring
details: A stunning 1-carat diamond solitaire ring set in 18k white gold. It comes with a GIA certificate of authenticity.

name: Sapphire and Diamond Necklace
details: A beautiful necklace featuring a 2-carat sapphire surrounded by brilliant-cut diamonds, set in 14k yellow gold.

name: Emerald Stud Earrings
details: Elegant emerald stud earrings with a total of 1.5 carats of emeralds, set in 18k rose gold.

name: Pearl Bracelet
details: A classic pearl bracelet featuring freshwater pearls with a sterling silver clasp.

name: Men's Titanium Band
details: A durable and stylish men's titanium wedding band with a matte finish.

name: Ruby Heart Pendant
details: A romantic heart-shaped pendant with a 1.2-carat ruby and diamond accents, set in 18k white gold.
